#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
using namespace std;


int main() {

    string s;
    cin>>s;

    int flag = 1;
    // Assign Flag a value of 0 or 1 depending on whether or not you find what you are looking for, in the given string
    int a[26]={0};

    for(int i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
        {
            a[s[i]-'a']++;
        }

    int count=0;
    for(int i=0;i<26;i++){

        if(a[i]%2!=0)
            count++;
        if(count>1)
            flag=0;
    }


    if(flag==0)
        cout<<"NO";
    else
        cout<<"YES";
    return 0;
}
